summary: Cloud sync Phase 2 & 3 testing completed successfully. All 8 requested features tested and working: Cloud sync via /api/observations endpoint, Sync status indicator (Synced/Syncing/Offline states), Google Auth removed from login page, Email/password login works for both coach_developer and coach users, Coach navigation has 4 tabs (Dashboard, My Development, My Sessions, My Profile), /coach/development route accessible with charts, check-first-user returns is_first: false, Club branding fields hidden when users exist.
passed_tests: POST /api/auth/login works with coach credentials (joe_morrissey@hotmail.co.uk / CoachTest123)
POST /api/observations creates new session and returns synced_at timestamp
GET /api/auth/me returns user info with valid token
Login page shows email/password form only (no Google auth button)
Coach Dashboard shows 4-tab navigation: Dashboard, My Development, My Sessions, My Profile
/coach/development route is accessible and shows charts
Sync status indicator shows 'Synced' state in bottom right corner
SyncStatusIndicator in header shows 'Saved Just now'
Signup form shows invite required note
Club branding fields hidden when is_first is false
critical_code_review_comments: PUT /api/observations/{session_id} requires full ObservationSessionCreate model including session_id in body - this is by design but could be simplified to accept partial updates
OfflineIndicator hides when online and synced with no pending items - this is intentional UX but means users may not see sync status unless there are issues
seed_data_creation: Test sessions created via /api/observations endpoint during testing - cleaned up after tests
context_for_next_testing_agent: Cloud sync Phase 2 & 3 fully implemented. Sessions are saved to MongoDB via /api/observations endpoint. Sync status indicator shows in bottom right corner (OfflineIndicator component) and header (SyncStatusIndicator component). Google Auth has been removed - only email/password login available. Coach users have 4-tab navigation (Dashboard, My Development, My Sessions, My Profile). Club branding fields appear on signup only when is_first is true (no users exist).

features_verified.cloud_sync: Sessions saved to MongoDB via /api/observations - WORKING
features_verified.google_auth_removed: Login page only shows email/password - VERIFIED
features_verified.email_password_login: Both coach_developer and coach logins work - VERIFIED
features_verified.coach_navigation: 4 tabs: Dashboard, My Development, My Sessions, My Profile - VERIFIED
features_verified.check_first_user: Returns is_first: false when users exist - VERIFIED
features_verified.club_branding_signup: Fields hidden when is_first is false - VERIFIED
